summary: This is a brief email correspondence dated July 30, 2019, providing an update on Jeffrey Epstein's status regarding suicide watch and psychological observation while he was in custody. It references his inmate number and appears to be an internal communication.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email update regarding his suicide watch and psychological observation status while incarcerated under inmate number 76318-054.

events.title: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update
events.description: An internal update was provided regarding Jeffrey Epstein's status on suicide watch and psychological observation while in custody.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 30, 2019, concerning an update on Jeffrey Epstein's suicide watch and psychological observation.
Jeffrey Epstein was identified by his inmate number: 76318-054.
The communication indicates authorities were monitoring Epstein's mental state and suicide risk while he was in custody.
